name: Ext_R5_ActivityDefinition_kind
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ActivityDefinition.kind for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ActivityDefinition.kind from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: A description of the kind of resource the activity definition is representing. For example, a MedicationRequest, a ServiceRequest, or a CommunicationRequest.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.kind` maps to R4B `ActivityDefinition.kind`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: A description of the kind of resource the activity definition is representing. For example, a MedicationRequest, a ServiceRequest, or a CommunicationRequest.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.kind` maps to R4B `ActivityDefinition.kind`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The kind of activity the definition is describing.
